<h3 id="X10944">X(10944)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-JOHNSON AND 1ST JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (2*a*(-b-c+a)+(b+c)^2)/(b+c-a)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10944) = (R-2*r)*X(1)+2*r*X(5)</b>
<p>X(10944) lies on these lines:{1,5}, {2,1388}, {4,2098}, {8,56}, {10,1319}, {30,5697}, {34,5101}, {36,5690}, {55,944}, {57,3632}, {65,519}, {145,388}, {169,4534}, {498,10246}, {499,5790}, {515,3057}, {517,1770}, {528,3885}, {529,3869}, {550,5559}, {594,604}, {664,3665}, {867,3938}, {946,5048}, {950,5919}, {956,5427}, {999,10573}, {1000,4294}, {1056,6901}, {1146,9310}, {1155,4311}, {1329,5176}, {1358,9312}, {1385,5432}, {1399,5255}, {1403,4030}, {1405,4969}, {1420,3679}, {1450,3214}, {1460,4046}, {1467,4915}, {1469,5846}, {1470,5687}, {1478,1482}, {1697,1709}, {1698,7294}, {1836,7982}, {2078,5258}, {2646,5882}, {2886,4861}, {2975,5172}, {3036,6691}, {3058,9957}, {3085,6952}, {3157,9933}, {3212,7198}, {3241,3485}, {3245,4325}, {3295,10043}, {3303,3486}, {3304,6946}, {3340,3633}, {3361,4677}, {3436,5289}, {3600,3621}, {3612,3655}, {3617,7288}, {3622,10584}, {3623,5261}, {3625,4315}, {3626,3911}, {3754,5083}, {3813,5086}, {3868,5855}, {3871,6224}, {3897,6690}, {3915,7299}, {3947,4870}, {4295,9657}, {4347,7286}, {4678,5265}, {4720,5323}, {5080,5330}, {5204,5657}, {5217,5731}, {5440,10915}, {5441,10386}, {5603,10893}, {5604,10920}, {5605,10919}, {5691,7962}, {5734,9656}, {5853,8581}, {6049,9780}, {6604,7223}, {6667,7705}, {8148,9655}, {8192,10829}, {8715,10609}, {9616,9649}, {9654,10247}, {9670,9785}, {9997,10871}, {10590,10595}, {10794,10797}</p>
<p>
X(10944) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (65,10106), (6284,3057), (10572,9957), (10950,1)<br>
X(10944) = inverse-in-Feuerbach-hyperbola of X(496)<br>
X(10944) = X(944)-of-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(10944) = homothetic center of inner Johnson and Caelum triangles<br>
X(10944) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,80,496), (1,355,11), (1,5252,12), (1,5443,10283), (1,5881,1837), (1,7741,1387), (1,7951,5901), (1,7972,1483), (1,10057,10523), (1,10827,5886), (8,404,8256), (8,3476,56), (8,4308,1788), (10,1319,5433), (11,10948,5), (12,1317,1), (65,10106,5434), (145,388,2099), (145,3434,10912), (388,2099,3649), (495,1483,1), (1385,10039,5432), (1788,3476,4308), (1788,4308,56), (3625,4315,4848), (3893,9850,65), (5886,10827,3614), (7982,9613,1836), (9957,10572,3058), (10283,10592,5443), (10956,10957,12)<br>
